Name: Andy Taylor
Comment: Would be useful to simply have a gift voucher function without the need for third party plugins such as Gift up. I contacted gift up and they actually said they didn't know anything about Webflow and a developer was needed. I've had to abandon Webflow eccommerce on three occasions now as all the clients wanted gift vouchers.

Name: Julia
Comment: Yes please!!! Gift vouchers are key to a lot of online businesses!
